div.p: These examples illustrate the use of the Library resource to share quality measurement and improvement logic as a FHIR resource.
The first example is the Chlamydia Screening Common library developed as the running example in the Author's Guide of the Clinical Quality Language specification.
The next two examples are derived from the Exclusive Breastfeeding Measure and are referenced by the PlanDefinition and Measure examples, respectively.
The next example is the logic library for the CMS146 Measure example.
The following two examples illustrate the use of the Library resource as an information model definition to carry the QUICK and FHIR model info files for use by CQL translators.
